title: Priya is 'w' years old now. Priya is 3 times as old as her cousin. How old was Priya's cousin 5 years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: Same question. Different variables and protagonists. Learn to use the search features and you’ll find the answer to your question is already answered… like a buhzillion times. Kinda wondering why Priya is ‘w’ years old, and not ‘x’ or ‘p?’ Whatever. Ah! That’s it… ‘w’ represents “whatever.” Doesn’t matter. Let Priya’s cousin’s age now = x Five years ago Priya’s cousin’s age was x-5. Tada.
Her cousin is now w/3 So 5 years ago her cousin's age was (w/3) - 5
